description: The government of Antigua and Barbuda imposes a nationwide 24 hour curfew on the 2nd of April until April the 9th A curfew from 8PM to 6AM had been imposed earlier on the 27th of March and should have lasted until the 11th of April

description: The government of Antigua and Barbuda closed the only international airport for all incoming flights on the 26th of March An exception are cargo aircraft private jets and island hopping planes
compliance: Mandatory (Unspecified/Implied),Mandatory with Exceptions (Please list exceptions in the text entry)
